```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DeclareDesign)
library(truncnorm) #for truncated distribution
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Declare_population()

```{r population, echo=TRUE}
set.seed(228) #Setting seed for randomization
population <- declare_population(
  village = add_level(N=500, #The population consists of 500 waterways.
    water_quality_index=rtruncnorm(n=N, a=0.38, b=8.21, 
                            mean=1.1, sd=0.1), 
    u=rnorm(n=N, mean=-13.4, sd=13.4)) #waterway-level variability (for calculating the treatment effect
)
```
